targets.query:
from(bucket: "eth_deribit_order_book")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "order_book")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /iv/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instrument_name"] == "ETH-29DEC23-1600-P")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "eth_deribit_order_book")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "order_book")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /iv/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instrument_name"] == "ETH-29DEC23-1200-P")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "btc_vol_analytics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "volatility")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["field"] == "mid_iv")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["tenor"] == "1M")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /iv/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instrument_name"] == "BTC-29SEP23-30000-C")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
